name: IBA Maritime and Transport Law Committee Conference
content: Attendance at this event will allow you to gain business intelligence on evolving issues in the market and to exploit the opportunities they present, while also providing the opportunity for you to build invaluable international connections through unparalleled networking with leading international maritime and transport professionals. Topics will include: 1\. From ocean carrier to full logistic service provider: Maersk, MSC and CMA CGM have changed their scope of business 2\. Ship and aviation finance: what's similar, what's different, what's new? 3\. The transportation industry and ESG 4\. Marine insurance: new developments 5\. Paperless trade and transport: fiction, future or reality 6\. Hot topics in shipping, transport and logistics Time: 6:00 PM - 3:30 PM Venue Details: Le Meridien Hamburg, 52 An der Alster, Hamburg, 20099, Germany Prices: Young lawyers (under 30 years): EUR 730.00, Academics / judges (full-time): EUR 730.00, Public lawyers: EUR 730.00, Corporate counsel\*\*: EUR 875.00, IBA member: EUR 970.00, Non-member\*: EUR 1125.00
